2025-01-01.saint: Solemnity of Mary, Mother of God
2025-01-01.history: Celebration of Mary’s divine motherhood, highlighting her role in the mystery of salvation.

2025-01-02.saint: St. Basil the Great and St. Gregory Nazianzen, Bishops and Doctors
2025-01-02.history: Two great Cappadocian Fathers known for defending the Trinity and enriching theology.

2025-01-03.history: Feast honoring the holy name of Jesus, symbol of salvation.

2025-01-04.history: First native-born American saint, founder of the Sisters of Charity.

2025-01-05.history: Celebrates Christ revealed to the nations through the Magi.

2025-01-06.history: Canadian brother devoted to St. Joseph, known for miraculous healings.

2025-01-07.history: Dominican priest, compiler of canon law, model of mercy.

2025-01-12.history: Marks the baptism of Jesus in the Jordan and the beginning of His ministry.
